name: @dubrowgn/impulse.js
description: Impulse.js is a high performance HTML5 game engine for JavaScript.

scripts.build: npx tsc && cat LICENSE dist/impulse.js > dist/impulse.js.lic && mv dist/impulse.js.lic dist/impulse.js
scripts.publish: cp package.json dist/. && cd dist && npm publish --access=public
scripts.test: npx ts-node --project test/tsconfig.json --dir . $(npx which pta) test/**/*.{j,t}s

author: me@dubrowgn.com
